alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Butler; Cape Girardeau; Scott; Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:20AM CDT until April 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Bollinger County in southeastern Missouri... Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Missouri... Northeastern Butler County in southeastern Missouri... Southern Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 419 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fisk to near Biggers, moving south at 145 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Poplar Bluff, Sikeston, Dexter, Scott City, Chaffee, Bernie, Bloomfield, Advance, Oran, Benton, Lake Wappapello State Park, Morehouse, Puxico, Morley, Kelso, Essex, Bell City, Delta, Fisk and Dudley. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 75 and 92. TIME...MOT...LOC 0919Z 021DEG 125KT 3679 9030 3630 9086 HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southern Illinois...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southern Illinois...and southeastern Missouri.
